text: phir jab (yoosuf ke bhaee) usake paas (misr) gaye, to kahaah he azeez! hamapar aur gamaare gharaane par aapada (akaal) aa padee hai aur ham thoda dhan (mooly) laaye hain, atah hamen (ann ka) poora maap den aur ham par daan karen. vaastav mein, allaah daanasheelon ko pratiphal pradaan karata hai
